mapper.insert: insert into comment (user_code, post_code, comment_time, comment_text, comment_depth, comment_parent) values (#{userCode}, #{postCode}, now(), #{commentText}, #{commentDepth}, #{commentParent})
mapper.select: select comment_code as commentCode, user_code as userCode, post_code as postCode, comment_date as commentDate, comment_text as commentText, comment_depth as commentDepth, comment_parent as commentParent from comment where post_code = #{postCode}
